Name: Invite Friend
ActivityDes: You can share your invite code to Lv.≥20 commandants. If they use your code, you will have invited them successfully.

Name: Invite Code
ActivityDes: Welcome back to Gray Raven HQ. You can input the invite code of other commandants to receive corresponding rewards.

Name: Returning Player Experience Survey
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
In order to create a better gaming environment, the Command Central has decided to conduct a survey regarding the in-game experiences of returning players. Please tap the [Advance] button below to share your thoughts! Rewards will be granted upon completion of the survey.

Name: Return Support
ActivityDes: During the event, commandants in the "Return" state can complete the missions and get the rewards (the event ends when the Return state expires).

Name: Through the Tide Home
ActivityDes: Event Info: Play through the new story [Through the Tide Home] and complete missions.

Name: Simulated Battlefield
ActivityDes:
Requirement: Clear Normal Story 1-12 to unlock.

Mission Info:
1. Earn Simulation Scores upon clearing a stage.
2. Spend Simulation Scores to purchase items at the Simulation Shop.
3. The limited-time shop exchange ends on August 21, 2025, at 7:00 AM.
4. During the event period, clear Simulated Battlefield stages and consume a certain amount of serum to claim rewards.

Name: The Godfall Revelation
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. The Godfall Revelation is kicking off—get on the Path of Revelation and take on the ultimate Desperado Clash.
2. This event features both a permanent game mode, [Path of Revelation], and a limited-time one, [Desperado Clash]. Both dole out [Mammon Platinum Coins] for the event shop.
3. In [Path of Revelation], you pick characters as your companion, dive into their backstories, and move their stories forward.
4. For [Desperado Clash], you'll kit out characters with skills and sigils to duel other Commandants.
5. The event shop offers rewards such as [Open the Door] Stamp and [Event Construct R&D Tickets].

Name: Rapid Pursuit
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.60

Event Info:
1. This event features 4 stages, each with 3 difficulty levels.
2. Defeat Bosses of different difficulties in bounties with the required characters.
3. Complete bounty missions to claim rewards.

Name: Wreck-It Shark-speare
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. The event introduces a new Fervor system. Every time you enter a Fervor state, you get enhanced moves, boosted items, and faster movement.
2. The event has 3 chapters, with 4 stages each. Each stage becomes available either over time or after you clear the previous one.
3. All stages have a turn limit. When you hit 25 turns, the game can wrap up early.
4. You can move one block per turn. Meet the requirements to clear blocks and rack up points.
5. You'll get a rating based on your score, which lets you claim event rewards accordingly.

Name: Murmurs of the Abyss
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. There are a total of 6 difficulty levels, all of which are highly challenging with [Chiko] being your formidable enemy.
2. All members will be reset once knocked out during the challenge, making the challenge easier to complete.
3. Each stage has its own 3-star clearance conditions. Collectibles will be rewarded once you have earned a total of 3 stars. The more stars you earn, the higher the quality of the collectibles will be.

Name: Omniframe Target
ActivityDes:
New Character:
※S-Rank Dark Attacker [Bianca: Crepuscule]

New Weapon:
※6★ [Aurora] (Lashblade)

Info:
1. Construct Research:
※[Bianca: Crepuscule] will be available in the [Themed Construct] Research Pool.
There is a 100% chance to get [Bianca: Crepuscule] upon getting an S-Rank Construct.
2. Weapon Research:
※[Aurora] will be available in the [Weapon Research] Research Pool
with the same rules and rates as other weapons.

Name: CUB Target
ActivityDes:
New CUB:
※S-Rank CUB: [Noctiluca]
※Recommended for the character [Bianca: Crepuscule]
※[Noctiluca] will be added to the [CUB Research] Pool.
When conducting CUB Research, it is allowed to choose any S-Rank CUB for target research.
During the event, if [Noctiluca] is selected for target research, it will have a 100% drop rate among S-Rank CUB.

Name: Tactical Assessment Manual
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Accumulate Intel Value by completing the Rating Missions of the Daily, the Round, and the current Intel Manual.
2. Raise the Rating Level by reaching the required Intel Value.
3. You will obtain the corresponding reward upon reaching the required Rating Level.
4. You can also purchase additional Intel to get better rewards.

Name: Threading Arts
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Help Discord with her garment-making commissions and reach the required scores to clear the stages.
2. The event has 4 chapters, each containing multiple stages that will be available over time based on your progress.
3. Use the garment-making tools available in the stages wisely and connect the thread balls correctly.
4. Clear the designated stages and accumulate chapter stars to complete missions and claim stamps, Event Construct R&D Tickets, and Tea Parlor Decor Bundle.

ActivityDes:

Event Info:

2. All members will be reset once knocked out during the challenge, making the challenge easier to complete.
3. Each stage has its own 3-star clearance conditions. Collectibles will be rewarded once you have earned a total of 3 stars. The more stars you earn, the higher the quality of the collectibles will be.

ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40 and clear Main Story 1-8

Event Info:
In this coating rerun event, you can choose and research a coating.
Eligible coatings included: [Love's Dawn], [Tsubaki], [Solitary Longings], and [Solitary Dream].
You may choose 1 of the coatings to research. The selected coating cannot be changed afterward.

Name: Where Nightmares Dwell
ActivityDes: Event Info: Play through the new story [Where Nightmares Dwell] and complete missions.

Name: Simulated Battlefield
ActivityDes:
Requirements:
Complete Normal Story 2-2 to unlock.

Mission Info:
1. Earn Simulation Scores upon clearing a stage.
2. Spend Simulation Scores to purchase items at the Simulation Shop.
3. The limited-time shop exchange ends on December 22, 2025, at 07:00 (UTC).
4. During the event period, clear Simulated Battlefield stages and consume a certain amount of serum to claim rewards.

Name: Babylonia - Commercial District
ActivityDes:
Requirements:
Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Explore Babylonia - Commercial District to experience rich storylines and gameplay content waiting for you.
2. Complete stories and gameplay activities to earn rewards.
3. Complete missions and exploration in the [Operation Guide] to claim [Chat Frames], [Stamps], [Ornaments] and [Decorations] for the Commandant's Lounge, as well as various other valuable rewards.

Name: Stellar Rush
ActivityDes:
Requirements:
Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. During [Stellar Rush], multiple characters will compete in a series of Kuroro races to vie for the ultimate champion title. You can predict the outcome before each race begins.
2. One race is held each day. Make your predictions before the race starts, then watch it live.
3. Earn tokens by making correct predictions or completing event missions.
4. Exchange tokens for rewards in the event shop.

Name: Desperado Clash
ActivityDes:
Requirements:
Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. A new limited-time season of [Desperado Clash] mode is now available.
2. This season introduces three new systems—accessories, character leveling, and Rune enhancement—to boost your combat power and resource earnings in Desperado Clash.
3. A limited-time shop is open during the event. Play any mode in [The Godfall Revelation] to earn Gold Crystals, which can be exchanged for rewards. The event ends on 2026/02/02.
4. Use [R&D Tickets] from the event shop to increase your Grade in Desperado Clash and earn exclusive [Nameplates]!

Name: Fluffy Snooze
ActivityDes:
Requirements:
Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Slide and merge bubble blocks to reach the target number within a limited number of moves, clearing blocks in the target area.
2. The event features 3 chapters, each containing 5 unique stages.
3. Complete stages and Star Missions to earn event tokens.
4. Exchange tokens in the event shop for various rewards.

Name: Tactical Analysis Compilation
ActivityDes:
Requirements:
Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Take on 5 stages using preset characters. Each stage is a highlight remake of iconic content from past versions.
2. You can't be defeated during these challenges, making it easier for all Commandants to enjoy and complete the event.
Earn a reward after clearing each stage. Finish all stages to receive the grand prize: [Anniversary Chat Frame].

Name: Death's Net
ActivityDes:
Requirements:
Commandant Lv.40
Event Info:

1. There are a total of 6 difficulty levels, all of which are highly challenging with [Melinoe] being your formidable enemy.
2. All members will be reset once knocked out during the challenge, making the challenge easier to complete.
3. Each stage has its own 3-star clearance conditions. Collectibles will be rewarded once you have earned a total of 3 stars. The more stars you earn, the higher the quality of the collectibles will be.
